DataElement.preferredName: ECOG Performance Status Outcome Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow clinical study participation, as outlined in the study protocol, that address the patient's results of a performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: ECOG Performance Status Outcome Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient._The result of an action._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
